record.description: Cut-away drawing shows equipment and construction needed for this country's free proton beam at the University of Chicago. At right is [the] 450-million electron volt Synchrocyclotron. At left is [the] new experimental room, located underground and heavily shielded. Speckled areas denote reinforced concrete (view facing south).
